V05prmosufu:0_0_0: (PrMoSū_Mū-LCh)Pār.2 yaḥ punar bhikṣur grāmagatam araṇyagataṃ vā pareṣāṃ adattaṃ steyasaṃkhyātam ādadīta yadrūpeṇādattādānena
V05prmosufu:0_0_1: rājā vainaṃ gṛhītvā rājamātro vā hanyād vā badhnīyād vā pravāsayed vā evaṃ cainaṃ vadet tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa bālo 'si mūḍho 'si
V05prmosufu:0_0_2: steyo 'sīty evaṃrūpaṃ bhikṣur adattaṃ ādadāvaḥ ayam api bhikṣuḥ pārājayiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ
V05prmosufu:par.3_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur manuṣyaṃ vā manuṣyavigrahaṃ vā svahastaṃ saṃcintya jīvitād vyaparopayec chastraṃ vainam ādhārayec chastrādhārakaṃ
V05prmosufu:par.3_0_1: vāsya paryeṣeta maraṇāya vainaṃ samādāpayen maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsyānusaṃvarṇayed evaṃ cainaṃ vaded dhaṃ bhoḥ puruṣo kiṃ te anena
V05prmosufu:par.3_0_2: pāpakenāśucinā durjīvitena mṛtaṃ te bhoḥ puruṣa jīvitād varam iti cintānumataiś cittasaṃkalpair anekaparyāyeṇa maraṇāya vainaṃ
V05prmosufu:par.3_0_3: samādāpayen maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsyānusaṃvarṇayet sa ca tena kālaṃ kuryād ayam api bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ /
V05prmosufu:par.4_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anabhijānann aparijānann asantam asaṃvidyamānam.
V05prmosufu:par.4_1_0: ... viśeṣādhigamaṃ jñānaṃ vā darśanaṃ vā sparśavihāratāṃ vā pratijānīyād idaṃ jānāmīdaṃ paśyāmīti sa pareṇa samayena samanuyujyamāno
V05prmosufu:par.4_1_1: vā asamanuyujyamāno vā āpanno viśuddhiprekṣy evaṃ vaded ajānaty evāham āyuṣmanto 'vocaṃ jānāmīty apaśyann evā .
V05prmosufu:par.4_2: .. ayam api bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ /
V05prmosufu:3_0_0: uddiṣṭā me āyuṣmantaś catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmā yeṣāṃ bhikṣur anyatamānyatamam āpattim adhyāpatya na labhate bhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ
V05prmosufu:3_0_1: saṃvāsaṃ bhogaṃ vā yathāpūrvaṃ tathāpaścāt pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ /
V05prmosufu:4_1: .. dvir api trir api paripṛcchāmi kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi
V05prmosufu:5_0: Uddāna SA.4-13: ... caryā sāṃcaritraṃ kuṭikā mahallakaḥ amūlaka leśika saṃghabhedas tasyānuvarti kuladūṣaka daurvacasya .
V05prmosufu:6_0: ime khalv āyuṣmantas trayodaśa saṃghāvaśeṣā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti
V05prmosufu:sa.2_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur avalavipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ kāyasaṃsargaṃ samāpadyeta hastagrahaṇaṃ vā bāhu .
V05prmosufu:pay.33_0: pāyantikā // dvau trīn vā pātrapūrān pratigṛhya bahir ārāmaṃ gatvā santo bhikṣavaḥ saṃvibhaktavyā ātmanā ca paribhoktavyaṃ ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V05prmosufu:pay.34_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhuktavān pravāritaḥ akṛtaniriktaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ khāded bhuṃjīta vā pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.35_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan bhikṣuṃ bhuktavantaṃ pravāritam akṛta atiriktena khādanīyabhojanīyenātyarthaṃ pravārayed idam āyuṣmaṃ
V05prmosufu:pay.35_0_1: khāda idaṃ bhuṃkṣva ity āsādanaprekṣī kaścid eṣa bhikṣur āsādito bhaviṣyaty etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.36_1: / tatrāyaṃ samayaḥ : glānasamayaḥ karmasamayo 'dhvasamayo nāvādhirohaṇaṃ mahāsamājaḥ śramaṇabhaktam ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V05prmosufu:pay.37_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur akāle khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ khāded bhuṃjīta vā pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.38_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃnihitaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ khāded bhuṃjīta vā pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.39_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur adattaṃ mukhābhyavahāryam āhāram āhared anyatrodakadantakāṣṭhāt pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.40_0: yāni tāni bhagavatā bhikṣūṇāṃ praṇītabhojanāny akhyātāni tadyathā kṣīraṃ dadhi navanītaṃ matsyo māṃsavallūrā /
V05prmosufu:pay.40_1: / yaḥ punar bhikṣur imāny evaṃrūpāṇi praṇītabhojanāny ātmārtham aglānaḥ parakulebhyo vijñāpya khāded bhuṃjītā vā pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.41-50_0: uddānaṃ // saprāṇabhojane sthānaṃ niṣadyācela senayā dvirātraudyūṣikāṃ gacchet prahārodgūra duṣṭhulāḥ /
V05prmosufu:pay.41_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan saprāṇakam udakaṃ paribhuṃjīta pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.42_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan sabhojane kule anupraskadyāsane niṣadyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.43_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan sabhojane kule rahasi praticchanne 'titiṣṭhet pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.44_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur acelakāya vā acelikāyai vā parivrājakāya vā parivrājikāyai vāstamāstaṃ ? khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ dadyāt pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.45_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur udyuktāṃ senāṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmet pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.46_0: syāt khalu bhikṣoḥ tadrūpaḥ pratyaya udyuktāṃ senāṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ dvirātraparamaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā tasyāṃ senāyāṃ vipravastavyaṃ tata uttari vipravaset pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.47_0: dvirātram api ced bhikṣus tasyāṃ senāyāṃ vipravasann udyūṣikāṃ vā gacched dhvajāgraṃ vā balāgraṃ vā senāvyūham anīkasaṃdarśanaṃ vā pratyanubhavet pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.48_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto 'nāttamanā bhikṣoḥ prahāraṃ dadyāt pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.49_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto 'nāttamanā bhikṣoḥ prahāram udgūrayed antatas talaśaktikā pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.50_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan bhikṣor duṣṭhūlām āpattiṃ praticchādayet pāyantikā // //
V05prmosufu:28_0: uddānaṃ sparśo jyotiś chando 'nupasaṃpādanena dharmavādī ca śramaṇoddeśo daurvarṇyaṃ ratnaparidāhasamayaś ca /
V05prmosufu:pay.51_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣum evaṃ vaded ehy āyuṣman kulāny upasaṃkramiṣyāvaḥ tatra te dāpayiṣyāmi praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ
V05prmosufu:pay.51_0_1: yāvad āpta sa tasyādāpayitvā tataḥ paścād eva vaded gaccha tvam āyuṣman na cet tvayā sārdhaṃ sparśo bhavati kathāyāṃ vā niṣadyāyāṃ
V05prmosufu:pay.51_0_2: vā api tv ekākina eva me sparśo bhavati kathāyāṃ vā niṣadyāyāṃ vā ity udyojanaprekṣī kaścid eṣa bhikṣur udyojito bhaviṣyatīty
V05prmosufu:pay.52_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ātmārtham aglāno vitapanaprekṣī jyotiḥ samavadadhyāt samavadhāpayed vā pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.53_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur dhārmike saṃghakaraṇīye bhikṣoś chandaṃ datvā paścād abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto nāttamanāḥ kṣepadharmam
V05prmosufu:pay.53_0_1: āpadyeta āhara bhikṣo cchandaṃ na te dadāmīti pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.54_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anupasaṃpannena pudgalena sārdhaṃ dvirātrād ūrdhvaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ prakalpayet pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.55_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur evaṃ vadet tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye āntarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā tenāpratisevyamānā
V05prmosufu:pay.55_0_1: nālam antarāyāyeti sa bhikṣur bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyo mā tvam āyuṣmann evaṃ vocas tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharmaṃ deśitam
V05prmosufu:pay.55_0_2: ājānāmi yathā ye āntarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā te ca pratisevyamānā nālam antarāyāyeti mā bhagavantam abhyācakṣu na sādhu
V05prmosufu:pay.55_0_3: bhavati bhagavato 'bhyākhyānaṃ na ca punar bhagavān evam āha anekaparyāyeṇāyuṣmann āntarāyikā dharmāḥ santa āntarāyikā evoktā
V05prmosufu:pay.55_0_4: bhagavatā te ca pratisevyamānā alam antarāyāyeti /
V05prmosufu:pay.55_1_0: / niḥsṛja tvam āyuṣmann idam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigatam evaṃ cet sa bhikṣur bhikṣubhir ucyamānas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed
V05prmosufu:pay.55_1_1: ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjed dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ samanuśāsitavyas tasya vastunaḥ pratiniḥsargāya dvir
V05prmosufu:pay.55_1_2: api trir api samanuyujyamānaḥ samanuśiṣyamāṇas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjet pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.56_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānaṃs tathāvādinaṃ pudgalam akṛtānudharmāṇam apratiniḥsṛṣṭe tasmin pāpake dṛṣṭigate ālapet saṃlapet saṃvaset
V05prmosufu:pay.56_0_1: saṃbhuṃjīta tena vā sārdhaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.57_0_0: śramaṇoddeśaś cāpy evaṃ vadet tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye āntarāyikāḥ kāmā uktā bhagavatā tena pratisevyamānā
V05prmosufu:pay.57_0_1: nālam antarāyāyeti sa śramaṇoddeśo bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyo mā tvam āyuṣmaṃ cchramaṇoddeśa evaṃ vocas tathāhaṃ bhagavato
V05prmosufu:pay.57_0_2: dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye āntarāyikāḥ kāmā uktā bhagavatā pratisevyamānā nālam antarāyāyeti mā bhagavantam abhyācakṣu
V05prmosufu:pay.57_0_3: na sādhu bhavati bhagavato 'bhyākhyānaṃ na ca punar bhagavān evam āha anekaparyāyeṇa ya .
V05prmosufu:pay.57_1_0: .. āntarāyikāḥ kāmāḥ santa āntarāyikā evoktā bhagavatā te ca pratisevyamānā alam antarāyāyeti niḥsṛja tvam āyuṣmaṃ cchramaṇoddeśa
V05prmosufu:pay.57_1_1: idam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigatam evaṃ cet sa śramaṇoddeśo bhikṣubhir ucyamānas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ
V05prmosufu:pay.57_1_2: no cet pratiniḥsṛjed dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ samanuśāsitavyas tasya vastunaḥ pratiniḥsargāya dvir api trir api
V05prmosufu:pay.57_1_3: samanuyujyamānaḥ samanuśiṣyamāṇas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjet sa śramaṇoddeśo bhikṣubhir
V05prmosufu:pay.57_1_4: idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ adyāgreṇa te āyuṣmaṃ cchramaṇoddeśa nāsau bhagavāṃs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śāstā vyapadeṣṭavyo
V05prmosufu:pay.57_1_5: nāpy anyatamānyatamo vijño gurusthānīyaḥ sabrahmacārī pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhavyo yad apy anye śramaṇoddeśā labhante
V05prmosufu:pay.57_1_6: kaścid asya bhikṣor muhūrtam apy asparśo bhaviṣyatīty etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.57_2: {on p. 7 = FE 10.3-7, 9.1-3 again parts of Pāy. 57, differs from labhante onwards:
V05prmosufu:pay.57_3: } labhante bhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ dvirātraparamaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ sāpi te 'dyāgreṇa nāsti cara pareṇa mohapuruṣa naśya tvaṃ /
V05prmosufu:pay.57_4: / yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānaṃs tathānāśitaṃ śramaṇoddeśam upasthāpayed upalāḍayet tena vā sārdhaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.58_0_0: na ca cīvarapratilambhād bhikṣuṇā trayāṇāṃ durvarṇīkaraṇānām anyatamānyatamad durvarṇīkaraṇaṃ nīlaṃ vā kardamaṃ vā kaṣāyaṃ
V05prmosufu:pay.58_0_1: vā anādāya ced bhikṣus trayāṇāṃ durvarṇīkaraṇānām anyatamānyatamaḥ durvarṇīkaraṇaṃ nīlaṃ vā kardamaṃ vā kaṣāyaṃ vā navaṃ
V05prmosufu:pay.59_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣu ratnaṃ vā ratnasaṃmataṃ vā svahastam udgṛhṇīyād udgrāhayed vā anyatrādhyārāmagatād vā adhyāvāsagatād vā pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.65_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.66_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣuṃ bhīṣayed bhīṣāpayed vā anantato hāsyaprekṣy api pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.67_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣor vā bhikṣuṇyā vā śikṣamāṇāyā vā śrāmaṇerakasya vā śrāmaṇerikāyā vā pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā śikyaṃ vā
V05prmosufu:pay.67_0_1: saritaṃ vā kāyabandhanaṃ vā anyatamānyatamaṃ vā śrāmaṇakaṃ jīvitapariṣkāram upanidadhyād upanidhāpayed vānyatra tadrūpāt
V05prmosufu:pay.68_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣoś cīvaram vā datvā tataḥ paścād apratyuddhārya paribhuṃjīta pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.69_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur dviṣṭo dveṣād apratītaḥ śuddhaṃ bhikṣum anāpannam amūlakena saṃghāvaśeṣeṇa dharmeṇānudhvaṃsayet pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.70_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur apuruṣayā striyā sārdham adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyetāntato grāmāntaram api pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:47_0: uddānam* // steyonaviṃśati khanet pravāraṇā śikṣitavyaṃ kalahānāṃ tūṣṇīṃ viprakrāmed anādarāt surāpānam akāle ca /
V05prmosufu:pay.71_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ steyasārthena sārdham adhvamārgaṃ pratipadyetāntato grāmāntaram api pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.72_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ūnaviṃśativarṣaṃ pudgalaṃ bhikṣubhāvāyopasaṃpādayet pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.72_1: / sa ca pudgalo 'nupasaṃpannas te ca bhikṣavo garhyā ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V05prmosufu:pay.73_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ pṛthivīṃ khanet khānayed vā pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.74_0: cāturmāsikī bhikṣuṇā pravāraṇā svīkartavyā anyatra samayāt pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.74_1: / tatrāyaṃ samayaḥ pratyekapratyekapravāraṇā punaḥ punaḥ pravāraṇā atyarthapravāraṇā nityapravāraṇā ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V05prmosufu:pay.75_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣubhir ucyamāno syāt te āyuṣmaṃ cchikṣāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ sa evaṃ vaden nāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ bālānāṃ mūḍhānām
V05prmosufu:pay.75_0_1: avyaktānām akuśalānāṃ vacanenāsyāṃ śikṣāyāṃ śikṣiṣye yāvan nāham anyān bhikṣūn prakṣyāmi sūtradharān vinayadharān mātṛkādharān
V05prmosufu:pay.75_1: / ājñātukāmena bhikṣuṇā tasyāṃ ca śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ praṣṭavyāḥ sūtradharā vinayadharā mātṛkādharā ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V05prmosufu:pay.76_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣūṇāṃ kalahajātānāṃ viharatāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ vigṛhītānāṃ vivādam āpannānāṃ tūṣṇīm aupaśrutikayā tiṣṭhed
V05prmosufu:pay.76_0_1: yad ete bhikṣavo vakṣyanti tad ahaṃ śrutvā tathā tathānuvyahariṣyāmīty etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.77_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃghasya dharmyāyāṃ viniścayakathāyāṃ kathyamānāyāṃ tūṣṇīṃ viprakrāmet santaṃ bhikṣum anavalokyānyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.80_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur akāle grāmaṃ praviśet santaṃ bhikṣum anavalokyānyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:58_0: uddānam* sabhojane 'ruṇe dānīṃ sūcīgṛhakapādakāḥ nahyān niṣadanaṃ kaṇḍū śāṭī sugatacīvaraṃ // ṛ //
V05prmosufu:pay.81_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sabhojane kule upanimantritaḥ pūrvabhaktaṃ paścādbhaktaṃ kuleṣu cāritram āpadyeta santaṃ gṛhiṇam anavalokyānyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.82_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anirgatāyāṃ rajanyām anudgate 'ruṇe anirhṛteṣu ratneṣu vā ratnasaṃmateṣu vā rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasyaindrakīlaṃ vā indrakīlasāmantakaṃ vā samabhiḥ
V05prmosufu:61_0: Pay.Schl. pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tuṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi // //
V05prmosufu:62_0: uddānam // grāmam antargṛhaṃ caiva śaikṣāṇy āraṇyakena ca prātideśyāni coktāni buddhena hitavādinā /
V05prmosufu:63_0: ime punar āyuṣmantaś catvāraḥ pratideśanīyā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti
V05prmosufu:pratid.1_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātikāyā bhikṣuṇyā rathyāgatāyā grāmaṃ piṇḍāya carantyā antikāt svahastaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pratigṛhya
V05prmosufu:pratid.1_0_1: khāded bhuñjīta vā tena bhikṣuṇā bahir ārāmaṃ gatvā bhikṣūṇām antike pratideśayitavyam garhyam asmy āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpanno
V05prmosufu:pratid.1_0_2: 'sātmyaṃ pratideśanīyaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmy ayaṃ dharmaḥ pratideśanīyaḥ /
V05prmosufu:pratid.2_0_0: bhikṣavaḥ khalu saṃbahulāḥ kuleṣūpanimantritā bhuṃja tatra ced bhikṣuṇī vyapadiśati sthitā syād iha khādyakaṃ dehi iha odanaṃ
V05prmosufu:pratid.2_0_1: dehi iha sūpikaṃ dehi iha bhūyo dehīti sā bhikṣuṇī tair bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyā āgamaya tāvat tvaṃ bhagini muhūrtaṃ
V05prmosufu:pratid.2_0_2: tūṣṇī yāvad ime bhikṣavo bhuṃjate ekabhikṣor api cen na pratibhāyantāṃ bhikṣuṇīm evaṃ vaktuṃ sarvais tair bhikṣubhir idaṃ
V05prmosufu:pratid.2_0_3: syād vacanīya bahir ārāmaṃ gatvā bhikṣūṇām antike pratideśayitavyaṃ garhyaṃ vayam āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpannā āsātmyaṃ pratideśanīyaṃ
V05prmosufu:pratid.3_0: yāni tāni saṃghasya śaikṣāṇi kulāni bhavanti śikṣāsaṃvṛtisaṃmatāni /
V05prmosufu:pratid.3_1_0: / yaḥ punar bhikṣus tadrūpeṣu saṃghasya śaikṣeṣu kuleṣu śikṣāsaṃvṛtisaṃmateṣu pūrvam apravāritaḥ san upasaṃkramya svahastaṃ
V05prmosufu:pratid.3_1_1: khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pratigṛhya khāded bhuṃjīta vā tena bhikṣuṇā bahir ārāmaṃ gatvā bhikṣūṇām antike pratideśayitavyaṃ garhyam
V05prmosufu:pratid.3_1_2: asmy āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpanno 'sātmyaṃ pratideśanīyaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmy ayam api dharmaḥ pratideśanīyaḥ
V05prmosufu:pratid.4_0: yāni tāni saṃghasyāraṇyakāni śayanāsanāni bhavanti sāśaṃkasaṃmatāni sabhayasaṃmatāni sapratibhayabhairavasaṃmatāni /
V05prmosufu:pratid.4_1_0: / yaḥ punar bhikṣus tadrūpeṣu saṃghasyāraṇyakeṣu śayanāsaneṣu sāśaṃkasaṃmateṣu sabhayasaṃmateṣu sapratibhayabhairavasaṃmateṣu
V05prmosufu:pratid.4_1_1: sarvam apratisaṃvidite vane bahir ārāmasya khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pratigṛhyānte ārāmasya khāded bhuṃjīta vā tena bhikṣuṇā bhikṣūṇām
V05prmosufu:pratid.4_1_2: antike pratideśayitavyaṃ garhyam asmy āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpanno 'sātmyaṃ pratideśanīyaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmy ayam api
V05prmosufu:68_0_0: uddiṣṭā me āyuṣmantaś catvāraḥ pratideśanīyā dharmās tatrāham āyuṣmantaḥ paripṛcchāmi kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ dvir api
V05prmosufu:68_0_1: trir api paripṛcchāmi kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V05prmosufu:69_0: uddānaṃ // nivāsanena sapta syus trayaś copari cīvare saṃvṛtodguṇṭhikollaṃghikayā kāyena + + + /
V05prmosufu:70_0: ime khalv āyuṣmantaḥ saṃbahulāḥ śaikṣā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti //
V05prmosufu:sai.1_0: parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā //
V05prmosufu:sai.2-7_0: nātyutkṛṣṭaṃ nātyapakṛṣṭaṃ na hastiśuṇḍakaṃ na tālavṛndakaṃ na kulmāṣapiṇḍakaṃ na nāgaśīrṣakaṃ nivāsanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V05prmosufu:sai.8_0: parimaṇḍalaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvariṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā //
V05prmosufu:sai.9-10_0: nātyutkṛṣṭaṃ nātyapakṛṣṭaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvariṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā //
V05prmosufu:sai.11-15_0: susaṃvṛtā supraticchannā alpaśabdā anutkṣiptacakṣuṣo yugamātradarśino 'ntargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V05prmosufu:sai.16-20_0: nodguṇṭhikā notkṛṣṭikayā notsaktikayā na vyastikayā na paryastikayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V05prmosufu:sai.21-25_0: nollaṃghikayā nojjaṃghikayā notkuṭukikayā na nikuṭotkuṭukikayā na khaṃbhākṛtā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V05prmosufu:sai.26-30_0: na kāyapracālakaṃ na bāhupracālakaṃ na śīrṣapracālakaṃ nāṃsotḍhaukikayā na hastasaṃlagnikayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V05prmosufu:79_0: uddānaṃ kuryān na viniṣatsyāmīty aṣṭau cāpi pratigrahe paṃca catus sapta paṃca satkṛtyādi tu bhojane /
V05prmosufu:sai.31_0: nānanujñātā antargṛhe āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā //
V05prmosufu:sai.32-39_0_0: nāpratyavekṣyāsanaṃ sarvakāyaṃ samavadhāya na pāde pādam ādhāya na gulphe gulpham ādhāya na sakthani sakthi ādhāya na saṃkṣipya
V05prmosufu:sai.32-39_0_1: pādau na vikṣipya pādau na viḍaṃgikayā antargṛha āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V05prmosufu:sai.40_0: satkṛtya piṇḍapātaṃ pratigrahīṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā //
V05prmosufu:sai.41-43_0: na samatittikaṃ samasūpikaṃ sāvadānaṃ pātrasaṃjñinaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pratigrahīṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
